name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a results-driven Senior Sales Engineer with a solid understanding of **CRM** systems and **plant asset management** solutions, I leverage my 8 years of experience to drive B2B sales and cultivate strategic account plans. My technical knowledge enables me to effectively communicate complex solutions to clients, ensuring their needs are met with precision and care. I have a proven track record of utilizing **MS Office** tools to streamline presentations and reports, enhancing client trust and satisfaction. 

In addition to my sales expertise, my background as a Full Stack Developer allows me to understand and articulate the technical details of products, such as those used in **condition monitoring** and **healthcare technologies**. My ability to merge technical acumen with sales strategies results in a deeper connection with clients and a stronger competitive advantage in the market.
